data.text:
General Description

Scholarship for academic performance may be awarded to a doctoral student who is on the I, II, III or IV year of doctoral studies in VŠB - Technical University of Ostrava. A list of students of doctorals courses who receive a scholarship for the best doctoral students will be created on the basis of decreasing the number of points awarded in the procedural competition. The amount of the scholarship is defined individually for each application by university's council.

Requirements

PhD student receives a scholarship, if at the same time will meet following conditions:his position on the list will be higher, than total number of scholarships available, does the work of teaching confirmed by the number of hours and the opinion of the head of the faculty, showed progress in the preparation of the doctoral dissertation confirmed by his or her promoter, showed progress in scientific research.
